Package de.oth.wizardry.items

Class InteractiveItem

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Entity
de.oth.wizardry.items.InteractiveItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, IInteractable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, MagicalBroom, MagicBox, Weapon, WorldItem
public abstract class InteractiveItem
extends Entity
implements IInteractable
An abstract super class for Items in the world, that can be interacted with. These could include doors, chests, or items that can be picked up.
Author:
Tobias Mueller
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractiveItem

      public InteractiveItem​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, java.lang.String modelName, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation)
      The InteractiveItemConstructor should by called by every object that implements the IInteractable interface. It automatically loads the corresponding 3D model, creates a BoxCollider and adds the IInteractable to the Entity- and InteractableItemManager.
      Parameters:
      position - the initial position of the item.
      modelName - the name of the items metafile.
      rotation - the initial rotation of the item.

    • InteractiveItem

      public InteractiveItem​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, java.lang.String modelName, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation, float scale)

    • applyPullForce

    • onUse

      public abstract void onUse()
      This method gets called by the InteractableItemManager whenever the player looks in the items direction and the "InteractableItemManager.activateItem" method is called.
      Specified by:
      onUse in interface IInteractable

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Removes the IInteractable from the Entity- and InteractableItemManager, which causes it to be no longer rendered, simulated and prevents interaction with it.
